title: Fluffy the Bird: Story Book for Kids with Moral Lesson
description: Fluffy the bird is a storybook for kids with moral lesson. It tells how Fluffy sang the most beautiful music, everyone who had the pleasure of hearing him was delighted. He truly had a gift! Was this what Fluffy was meant to do? Did he have a purpose? Was his voice a way to make the world a brighter place? With a bright future and so much potential ahead of them, encouraging children to uncover their natural talents and skills is vital in their development. Take a journey with Fluffy as he discovers his purpose in life, discovering his talent and opening up a world of possibilities for children. A sweet bedtime short stories for childre age 3-12.
author: Ronald Destra
